1.content:
Justin was a nerd. But he was also a genius. Tired of being pushed around by both the girls and the boys at East Metropolis High, he developed a muscle and strength enhancer. Placing the enhancer in different sports drinks of various strengths and mixtures, Justin was about to try the formula out on himself, or perhaps others in his school. Only there were a couple of major problems he did not foresee.

The drink would work on boys, but only slightly, no more than a few good gym work outs even at the highest concentration. However, the boys then carry the potential for girls to gain the abilities of the drink at an even higher level through the boy’s semen. And to add to the strangeness, boys who drank the formula became very attractive to females close to them while the drink acted as a pumped up Viagra. The other issue was that girls who drank the formula straight away would gain the abilities Justin had intended, only at higher levels.

Justin looked over the various sport drink bottles he had created. In order to keep things straight he decided to use different colors for different capabilities of his enhancement formula. Of course he could always make more, or change the mix, but for now he was satisfied. If things worked as he expected, then he would be the biggest, strongest boy in school. And then the bullying would stop. At least that was the plan. He needed to decide if he just wanted to go for it, or possibly try it out on someone else to check for any side effects, which he may have calculated to be none. But that’s what field tests were for. Justin looked at his notes and back at the bottles.

Blue was moderate muscle gain and strength increase.
Yellow was large muscle gain and large strength increase
Red was very large muscle gain and strength increase.

Of course moderate, large and very large were all subjective at this point, but it did relate to the mix percentages and potencies.

Justin glanced at the door of the chemistry lab he was in. The professor allowed him the extra time in the lab as Justin was clearly the best student in school. Now he was ready to see if what he had created really was everything he hoped. So as he pushed his glasses back up toward the bridge of his nose, he looked up at the door, thinking he heard the door knob turn. Looking at the door, he saw...
1.title: The Beginning

choices: Christine drinks the yellow formula and gets a fitness beauty's physique.
Christine drinks the red formula and becomes a mega buff bodybuilder.
Before Christine can drink the formula Justins Lab partner enters
Justin makes a play for his formula.
11.content:
Justin froze when he saw who was standing in the doorway. It was Christina, one of the cheerleaders and star of many of Justin’s fantasies. She was drop dead gorgeous and Justin loved to watch her various curves slither as she walked. In truth Christina was the primary reason Justin wanted to create his enhancement formula. Her boyfriend was Stephen, who was one of the biggest and strongest on the football team. Justin thought that if he could build a body to rival Stephen’s (or, even better, outgrow him) then maybe he would have a shot at winning Christina’s heart, or at the very least get to stop being so nasty to him. The added benefit of no longer being the target of Stephen’s bullying was the icing on the cake.

But Dennis was not prepared to see her, not yet. Not when he was so close to his dream.

“Hey science dweeb,” she said from across the room. “What are you up to?”

“Nothing,” he fired back with a frozen stare that told her that he was most definitely up to something.

Christina smiled and began sauntering across the room, swaying her hips as seductively as she could. She loved the effect her body had on men, and relished any chance she had to exert her control. She was wearing her cheer outfit which was red and black with a tight top that molded itself to her generous C cup breasts and left just a hint of her stomach exposed above the waist of her skirt. The skirt in question was pleated and swayed as she walked showcasing her favorite physical attribute: her legs, which were shapely, very long, and very very strong. She never told anyone, but her idol was the James Bond villainess Xenia Onatopp. Christina loved to trap Stephen with her powerful thighs and squeeze until he was begging for release. Her upper body was no match for Stephen’s incredible strength but when it came to her lower limbs she was fully in control. She’d been working out for years focusing on cardio routines to keep her fitness level up, but recently she’d added specific exercises to work her legs extra hard with full blown weight training. The results were the sculpted pillars of strength that were now propelling Christina toward where Justin was standing.

As she rounded one of the desks and came into full view Justin’s heart began pounding in his chest. He watched as her thighs flexed and hardened with each step and her calves bunched into sexy swells. “What are you doing here?” he asked.

“Oh, well originally I was just looking for some notes I had left here by mistake, but now I think I’ve found something much more interesting. What’s with the sports drinks? You must be mighty thirsty.” She reached where Dennis stood and traced a path around him, circling like a shark looking for the right time to strike. The fact that she stood 2 inches taller than him made her all the more menacing.

“No, it’s just something I’m working on, a.. uh..” he stammered looking for a lie to tell her.

“A muscle growth and enhancement formula?” she asked.

Justin nearly jumped out of his skin. “NO! What... why would you think that?”

She stopped behind him and reached her hand around his right shoulder while getting her mouth very close to his left ear while her warm, soft breasts pressed into his back. She picked up one of Justin’s many papers from off the desk and held it up. “Because it says right here that your formula is intended ‘to increase the mass and density of the subjects muscles creating enhanced physique and vastly superior strength that could, in some instances, be considered superhuman.’”

Justin gulped.

Christina put the paper back down and shoved Justin aside where he went tumbling to the floor. He looked up at the statuesque beauty who just stared at him with contempt. “Now I know I’m just a poow dumb widdle cheeweader, but it looks to me, from your notes, that you set up three different concentrations in the three different bottles. And that if I drink one of them I’ll be able to grow bigger and stronger. I don’t know about you, but to me that sounds like some real fun!”

1122.title: Justin thinks of a plan

1123.content:
“But wait, where are you going?” Justin asked, trying to somehow position his hands in a way that would stop Christine from grabbing the two remaining bottles on the table. But Christine, already an incredibly athletic girl before the growth, now possessed the size and strength of a guy football player of equivalent height and easily shoved the nerd aside.

“Nowhere, just to the locker room” She said with a smile while taking hold of the energy drink bottles and putting them in her backpack “Now if you will excuse me”

“Wait! You don’t know what those bottles will do to you! You’ll turn into a huge muscle monster!” Justin protested. As much as he wanted to witness a rampaging giantess, he wanted to be at least in control and be able to stop her if things went out of hand.

“Me?” Christine said in surprise, rubbing her hand down her toned abdomen, partially exposed by her shirt which was too short and too tight for her size now “Who said I was going to the girls’ locker room? I’m heading to where the guys are at!”

Christine slipped out the door of the lab and hastily grabbed a mop in the hallway that the janitor had forgotten. She proceeded to jam it in the handles of the door, effectively locking Justin in, while she skipped off down the hallway… Stephen would be pleased, very pleased.

---

Christine arrived at the male locker room and promptly let herself in. None of the footballers had issues with her knowing the access code to the locker room. After all, who didn’t love the sight of this incredibly hot beauty prancing in, usually dressed skimpily, and triggering a testosterone-fest in the room of eighty or so football jocks? They were treated to a stunning sight each time she visited her boyfriend Stephen before football practice, which was essentially every day of the week.

Something was different about Christine today, but it wasn’t immediately noticeable. She had always been toned but today she looked even more athletic; and as she walked confidently across the locker room, plenty of eyebrows (and erections) were raised. It wasn’t the added height that put her eye-to-eye with most of the still-growing football players or how it looked like she was wearing clothes two sizes too small, and it wasn’t the additional muscle that made her arms and legs look noticeably more defined; it was as if Christine was emitting an invisible but intense aura; pheromones that were driving the guys crazy

“So you’re finally eighteen as of last week, huh?” Christine giggled as she approached Stephen “Finally as old as I am” Christine had turned eighteen the month before at the start of the semester.

“Chrissy? You… thanks…” Stephen stopped what he was doing and stood shirtless and slightly baffled at Christine. “You look amazing today. Did you…” he couldn’t put a finger on what had changed, but whatever it was, Christine looked incredible and it was making his member rise within the confinements of his jockstrap.

“Happy belated 18th birthday sweetheart” Christine interrupted his thoughts with a hug “Sorry I couldn’t make it to the crazy dinner, but at least I was there for the after party, right?” Christine smiled as she reached for her bag. “Here, I brought you a little something…” After fiddling around lazily for one of the two bottles, Christine pulled out the…

121.title: Blue bottle(least)

122.content:
Amanda swallowed the yellow vial. The aftertaste was a little bitter but nothing too unbearable. Ten minutes went by, nothing. Fifteen, twenty. At exactly the 22 minute mark, Amanda felt a gurgling in her stomach. Then her face turned red as all of her muscles began to cramp up all at once.

"AHH!!!! IT HURTS!!!"

"Amanda!! Are you alright???"

"No you idiot! Do you think I'm screaming because it feels good??"

"What can I do??"

"I don't know what's happenin - ohhh!! Here it comes again!!!"

Amanda fell off her stool and began convulsing on the ground. Justin quickly cleared area around her and watched helplessly as she continued to seize. After 3 minutes, the seizure stopped and Justin helped her to her feet.

"Are you alright?"

"I think so, but right now all I want to do is sleep."

Do you want me to take you home?"

"I think I can manage on my own, thanks Justin."

Justin walked with Amanda out to the parking lot and helped her into her car.

"I'm so sorry Amanda."

Amanda smiled at him weakly.

"What are you sorry about? You didn't force me to drink that stuff. Just make sure to fix that freaky side effect. Got it?"

"Yeah..."

"Hey. Don't worry about me. I'll see you tomorrow."

Justin smiled at her guiltily as she pulled out of the parking lot and drove off.
122.title: Yellow bottle(moderate)

1222.content:
Two weeks passed since the incident and Amanda still hadn't returned to school. Justin tried calling her every other day, only to have her mother say she wasnt receiving any calls. This only caused Justin to feel even more guilty about what happened that day. He spent everyday poring over his notes to find where the problem with the formula lied. On Friday afternoon, Justin sat at the lab table engrossed in thought when he felt someone tap him on the shoulder. He turned around to find Amanda grinning at him. He nearly fell off his stool.

"Amanda!! Is that you? Are you ok??"

"Why do you keep asking me that?? For the last time, I am fine!!"

"Geez!!! Well sorry for caring about you!! It won't happen again!!!

Amanda reached over and touched Justin's cheek.

"Justin, you are the kindest, sweetest boy I've ever known. My mom told me about all the phone calls. I swear to you, I'm okay. Even better than okay. See?"

Amanda stood back and let Justin get good look at her. She was wearing her usual pea-green hoodie and baggy, tan cargo pants. It was then that Justin realized that Amanda was looking him in his eyes!!

"You've gotten taller!!"

"That's one thing. Anything else?"

She turned in a slow circle for Justin. Her hair was in two braids but instead of stopping just above shoulders they now fell down her back almost to her hips.

"Your hair is longer. Extensions??"

"Nope, all mine. But that's two. Keep going Mr Science Whiz!"

"Hair, height, what else?" Justin thought. He looked at her closely. And it hit him.

"Your eyes!! They're gray instead of blue!!"

Amanda grinned as she took off her glasses.

"Ding,ding,ding!! Congratulations Mr Meacham! You're a winner. And now for your prize!!"

She began reaching for the zipper on her hoodie then changed her mind.

"On second thought, let's take this someplace a bit more private."

She grabbed his hand and led him to one of the storage closets in gymnatorium. After making sure the door was locked and bracing it with a chair she turned to Justin.

"First of all, let me say thank you for allowing me to be your guinea pig. The formula worked even better than I could've hoped for. Check out what else it did."

Amanda unzipped her hoodie and Justin gasped. Amanda was built like a bodybuilder! Broad, thick deltoids, unabridged dictionary thick pecs, and cobblestone like 8-pack abs. Her now FFF-cup breasts were straining the cheap cotton wife beater she was wearing to almost complete transparency. She slowly flexed her biceps to their 23 1/2 inch size.

"So. Do you like what you see??"

Justin swallowed hard in reply.

"I'll take that as a yes. This is why I didn't come back to school right away. After I realized the formula was working, I started using the universal machine my dad had bought some years ago. And I moved the weight bench into my room so I could do a chest workout every night before bed and every morning when I wake up. I took two weeks off to get really pumped up so I can show my last little surprise."

Amanda grabbed the front of her shirt and ripped it off like it was tissue paper revealing her silver nipple studs and her navel ring. Then she unbuttoned her pants and let them drop to her ankles. Not only was she not wearing any panties but she had a tattoo of Justin's initials in a heart just above her vagina. She then kicked off her pants, and pushed Justin down onto a nearby folding chair. Amanda straddled his waist and pushed his face in between her breasts. She then held him there until she felt him struggling for air.

"Oh, and in case you haven't figured it out yet, you're my boyfriend now. If I catch any other bitches hanging around you, they're dead. Capisce??"

Justin nodded. Too scared and aroused to protest.

"Good boy. Before I forget..."

Amanda reached into her pants pocket and pulled out 300 dollars.

"What's this for??"

"After my mom saw what your formula did for me, she decided she wants some too. This is what I told her it would cost."

"What??"

"Hey. This stuff has the potential to make us millionaires. And besides, it's never too early to start saving for Ashley's college education."

"Ashley?? Who's Ashley??"

"The name of the baby I'm going let you fuck into me after we graduate high school of course!"

"If your mom wanted some of the formula, all you had to do was ask. You didn't need to charge her."

"Yeah, but those chemicals don't come cheap. And I'm sure once she gets some, someone else will want some. And then another and another and another. We can't afford to keep giving away freebies. We'll never get rich like that."

"True. Good thinking Amanda."

"But of course babe. ONE of us has to provide for our family."

"So now I can't provide for us. Is that it??"

"Of course not baby. My big, strong man can do anything! Especially take care his weak, frail, little wife."

"I don't think the words, "weak", "frail" and "little" apply to you any more babe."

Amanda laughed.

"Guess not. Aren't you happy about that?"

"Hope not. Anyway. As much as fun as it is dry humping you in a random closest, and I have no problems doing that, I have things to do. I need to drop off my sick note, pick up my assignment list, then I'm going home to get some sleep."

122221.content:
At precisely 6 p.m., Justin knocked on Amanda's door. It was her mother who answered. She looked almost identical to her daughter used to look save for being an inch or two shorter, with slightly graying hair and a few wrinkles. She smiled when she saw him.

"Hello Justin. Please come in. Amanda is not done working out yet and my husband is on his way home from work. We'll have dinner as soon as he arrives."

"Ok."

"Go have a seat in the livingroom while I get us some lemonade."

Justin sat down on the couch and stared at the pictures on the entertainment center. There were pictures of her parents' wedding. Her mother truly did look identical to her daughter when she was younger. There were pictures of her mother smiling embarrassed at being photographed pregnant. Amanda's birth, her kindergarten graduation, first day of elementary school, then pictures of him and Amanda winning the blue ribbon at the science fair in middle school. By this time, her mother had returned with the drinks and sat down in an arm chair opposite Justin.

"Amanda said you've been working on improving your growth serum."

"Yes ma'am."

"She said there were some nasty side effects involved?"

"There were. But I discovered my error. The amount of potassium sulphate solution I'd added as a stabilizing agent was too high. By reducing it, not only did I eliminate the side effects but it also increased the rate of reaction and the potency."

"Really?? That's incredible!!! Do you think it will work?"

"Of course it will work. My man is a genius."

Justin felt a pair of extremely large breasts in a sweat soaked sports bra press against the back of his neck and some powerful, veiny forearms draped around his shoulders.

Justin reached up to caress Amanda's face and she playfully bit then sucked his finger.

"Enjoy your workout?"

"Always. Is the formula ready?"

"Of course. Got it right here." Justin said, patting his shirt pocket.

"Great!! Anyway, I need to get out of these sweaty clothes and go take a shower. Let's go upstairs so you can help me wash my....well everything!!!"

"He most certainly will NOT!! You go upstairs and cleaned up while Justin remains down here. The two of you can play together after supper."

Amanda's mother grinned and winked at her daughter. Amanda laughed then bent over and put tongue down Justin's throat.

"Don't go anywhere until I get back."

"No chance of that happening."

Amanda's mother shook her head as her daughter bounded up the staircase.

"So Justin. Can I have the formula now??"

"I'd recommend waiting until after dinner. I think that was Amanda's other mistake. She took the formula on an empty stomach so the muscle tissue had nothing to feed off of when they were growing."

"I see. Alright, whatever you think is best doc."

They then heard the garage door open.

"Perfect timing."

Alison got up and went to check on the food as her husband Charles came through the door.

"Justin! How are you son?"

"Just great sir. How are you?"

"Tired as usual. Company's got this huge project they're working on so I'm dead on my feet. Heard you brought something for my wife?"

"Uh. Yeah, the growth formula that Amanda and I were working on."

"Yeah. And we can all see how well that worked out. She's nearly as big as some of the guys on my crew."

"Oh daddy. Stop..." Amanda said as she came downstairs and sat next to Justin.

"I mean it honey. Some of that weight I been seeing you throw around down in the basement, I should probably hire YOU instead!!"

"No thanks dad. I'll be too busy having babies for Justin to do construction work."

Justin spat out his lemonade.

"What?? What babies?"

"Don't look so shocked Justin. She's been planning this since the night you two won the science fair back in middle school."

"That's right. In fact, after you and your parents left the restaurant after the celebratory dinner, as we were walking back to the car she told her mother and I that one day she wants you to put a baby in her. She didnt care if you didn't want to get married or be in the child's life."

"Really Amanda? You really think I'd do that to you??"

"Well...I don't know. You may not want to be a father or whatever so I wanted to make sure you weren't under any pressure."

"That wouldn't be fair to you!! In fact, I wouldn't DARE do such a thing."

Amanda giggled and began kissing Justin in front of her parents. Her father then cleared his throat. Justin pulled away immediately.

"How about you two wait until AFTER we're finished eating to begin your baby making huh??"

"Yeah. Wait a minute, you two are okay with your daughter having a child this early?"

"Well son, from what I've seen, it doesn't look I have much say in the matter. And I've known you since the day you two met in kindergarten. My daughter couldn't have picked a better young man to father her children."

"I agree 100%. You two will make gorgeous babies. And incredibly smart too."

When dinner ended, Justin thanked Amanda's parents and headed for the door. Amanda immediately got up and grabbed his arm, pulling him toward the stairs.

"I can't. I have to go home and take care of some other business for a friend. Sorry Mandy."

"Aww....what about when you're done??"

"This project is going to take a while. I'll see you tomorrow."

"Ok Justin..See you....."

"I'll call you to say goodnight as soon as I'm done."

Amanda perked up immediately.

"Wait! I nearly forgot!!"

He dashed back in the house and handed the vial of serum to Amanda's mother.

"Mrs..."

"Alison"

"Alison. Take this before bed. If you feel any unpleasant side effects let me know."

"Will do. Thanks Justin."

He then turned around and went back outside to Amanda.

"I gave your mom the vial. Let me know if anything goes wrong."

"Gotcha...you DID warn her about the tremendous boost in libido right??"

"No. Maybe I should.."

Amanda stopped him in his tracks.

"Nope. Let them figure it out for themselves. Talk to you later hon."

132.content:
Before anyone could come in, Justin had drunk the red sports drink, thinking he'd just heard things. And as the liquid went down his throat, he began to feel amazing.

Justin's whole body began to swell, muscles expanding to bigger proportions. Both of his biceps grew, and so did his triceps that hung underneath, while his forearms thickened with strong sinews. Justin's deltoids became ripped and striated, made evident by the multiple lines that dotted the round shape of his shoulders. Veins began to rise to the surface; seemingly liquid fire coursing through them.

Meanwhile, the nerd's legs thickened with sinews as his quads inflated. Dense muscle mass appeared out of nowhere, turning his limbs into strong pillars. Deep lines were etched in between the individual vastus muscles. Both of his calves ballooned outwards, creating the image of bodybuilder-like legs of professional standing. Even his glutes became rock hard, as well as more pronounced.

Justin panted as his chest exploded with muscle; a total of eight dense abs formed on his previously unremarkable belly, creating an impenetrable wall of muscle, and his pectorals grew to the size of book covers. The teen's back packed on a hefty amount of new, sturdy tendons that gave off the impression of a tapestry of defined muscles. Justin's traps rose like twin volcanoes.

The serum did wonders for him. Justin couldn't believe what he saw in the nearby glass cabinet's reflection; it was him, but so much bigger!

Eventually the growth stopped, and the nerdy teen was nearly overwhelmed by this feeling of raw, intense power.

"Justin? Are you still in there?" The door swung open, allowing his favorite teacher to come in. Justin gasped in surprise and embarrassment, but it was too late. "What are you-- oh my god!"

"It's not what it looks like!"

His cheeks flushed red as miss Yassine stared at him with wide eyes, shock written all over her face. It wasn't so much the situation that made things awkward, as the fact that he wasn't wearing much in the terms of clothes anymore.

Justin's growth had been explosive in how his clothing had been torn to shreds. By his estimation, he'd shot up to what had to be 6'4" in height, and was now the size of a professional bodybuilder. His legs were thick, covered by bulging lumps of muscle, which had reduced his pants to tiny shorts that barely hung onto his lower body anymore. In contrast, the shirt he'd been wearing was gone; reduced to tatters at his feet.

This meant that most of his body was exposed. Every inch of muscle-covered skin was laid bare to his teacher, and she seemed to drank it all in. From his meaty pectorals to his cobblestone-like abs, and his bulky arms to his vein-covered forearms; none of it was hidden.

"Miss Yassine, I can explain." Oh god, even his voice was deeper. Justin loved his new look though. All of this size and strength was what he'd hoped for. "See, this was part of my... uhm, experiment."

"Experiment you say..." The woman in her early forties muttered under her breath.

Miss Yassine was of eastern decent. Her skin was an exotic mocha color, and her hair was pitch black. Her eyes, however, were a lovely shade of green. More than that, she was quite pretty in Justin's eyes. While her breasts were very small, her butt was a work of art, and he'd always admired her toned legs.

But now he just wished the ground could swallow him whole. Why is that she had to see him like this, just when he had finished his work?

Justin smiled awkwardly. "My muscle growth formula was a success. Well, maybe a bit too much. Should have brought more appropriate clothing, I suppose."

"Yes, you could say that." The older woman said dryly, still staring at his broad chest. There was something about that gaze that made him shudder. "It's good to see that your work was not for nothing, Justin. That intellect of yours is really something. Still, next time you decide to test some new concoction, don't do it on your own or in my classroom."

"Right. I'm so sorry." He gulped nervously, expecting a punishment.

But it didn't come. Instead, miss Yassine came closer, inspecting his body to get a closer look. The attention made him squirm. Was this what it felt like to be ogled?

"This muscle definition is really something... I've seen bodybuilders who aren't as big or defined as you." She admitted.

"Oh, thanks? I think? Maybe I should take measurements or something."

"Mhm, that would be for the best. A good way to evaluate your results, in order to see how successful your experiment was, is by comparing them to your previous measurements."

The teacher walked over to a nearby drawer, and pulled out a measuring tape that she normally used during class. Despite the close contact, Justin tried to remain as impassive as he could while the woman, who he secretly thought was hot, took his measurements.

"Oh, my! Biceps are 19 inches, calves are 18.5 as is your neck, chest at 54, thighs at 29, and finally your waist is 31 inches." By the end of her journey, miss Yassine seemed equally flustered. Her cheeks took on a darker color. "That's some impressive growth, Justin! If you don't mind me saying so, you were rather skinny a while ago."

Justin nodded weakly. "Yeah, sounds about right. I've never been really big or average."

"Perhaps. But that's clearly changed; you have the body of a professional bodybuilder. This serum of yours is revolutionary!" His teacher's praise was making him blush. After all, he wasn't used to such attention from the opposite sex.

However, she was speaking the truth. The serum he'd made was incredible. And that was also how Justin felt; every fiber of his body had been turned into something greater, carrying amazing strength. Truth be told, he was bigger than the jocks on the football team. Hell, he was probably the biggest guy in the entire school!

Justin then noticed the heavy stare that his teacher had aimed at his nether region. Confused by the sudden silence, he looked down as well, past his bloated pecs.

"Huh?!"

Gawking was all he could do, finally noticing that his muscles weren't the only thing that had been affected by the serum. Justin's cock had gone through its own growth spurt. It was still confined within his pants and underwear, but barely. It was so long and thick that the bulge was visible through the fabric. Justin was mortified to see that the tip of his dick poked through one sleeve.

"I'm so sorry!" He shouted, quickly covering his member with his hands. One of the perks of having such meaty forearms, was apparently the added coverage that they provided. Justin's face was beet red. "I-I-I didn't..."

Miss Yassine was quiet. Not what he would have expected, actually. Come to think of it, she was breathing heavily and really close to him.

"Justin, you smell wonderful. What is this... this addictive musk of yours?"

The older woman suddenly placed her hands on his chest, groping the firm muscles. Justin was absolutely speechless. Miss Yassine's eyes were visibly dazed, and she didn't seem to be in control of herself.

Was she... aroused?!
132.title: Female ages 35-43

choices: He had gulped down the red
14.content:
"JUSTIN! , What the FUCK do you think you're doing? I've been looking for my sports drink all afternoon and here it is with you?" Stephen yelled at Justin.
Stephen was the Captain of the football team at 6' even, he had a wide chest and a well defined 6-pack.
He had sizeable calves and biceps. Every part of his body was a reminder of the time that he put into the gym training.
Justin shocked tried to say that it wasn't but all that came out was a meek stuttered "B-B-But i"
"Well you had better have been working on MY homework to pass the science lessons. Because if I fail then you will be on the receiving end of football practice"
Stephen grabbed the drink bottle, squirted some of the drink into his mouth before swallowing it all while leaving the lab.
Justin realised that he was watching Stephen talk so much that he didn't know what was taken, hastily checking the bottles Justin realised what had happened.
14.title: The local Jock

choices: Tammy started with a sip of the blue vial.
15.content:
When running through the possible test subjects that would appreciate an invention like this, one name immediately sprung to his mind. Tammy.

If he thought his issues with bullying were bad, that all went double for poor little Tammy. Standing at an adorable 4'10" at 16 years old, she would be pushed around like nobody's business. "Runt", "Gremlin", "Doorstop", she's heard them all before. Justin's heard her crying in the bathroom at least twice.

Because of this, Justin was one of the few people she could actually trust and get along with. When she was at home, she found her escapism through video games. RPGs, especially.


After a quick phone call and bike ride, Justin made his way to Tammy's place. He knocked on the front door and was greeted by Tammy's mother.
"Oh hey, Justin. Tammy told me you were coming. She's in her room." She explained.

"Thanks, Mrs. Tesmer." He replied.

"I'm have to be at a dentist appointment, and her father's out with his friends, so I'm trusting you two to be home alone. Don't do anything you know you're not supposed to."

"Oh my god!" Justin jokingly exclaimed.

Justin walked down the hall, knocked on Tammy's bedroom door and let himself in. Tammy was sat at her computer playing The Elder Scrolls: Online.
"Did I catch ya while you were doing something?" Justin asked.

"Oh, uh, no. This actually a good stopping point. So what's all this about?" Tammy responded.

Justin paused for a moment, and before answering the question asked, "I thought you said that game sucked ass?"

"It got better after the DLCs. But no, seriously, why did you want to come over?"

Justin paused for dramatic effect and sat his backpack down on the floor. "I... have a surprise for you." He paused again... "What if I told you, that in my chem lab, I made a serum that can make you bigger and stronger."

Tammy, in a very poor attempt at doing a low-pitched grungy voice, said, "Don't do that. Don't give me hope."

"No, seriously, it's for real!" Justin shot back. "Remember that award I got a few months back, that was because I got the serum to work on live rats!" It was at this point that Justin pulled the 3 vials out of his backpack and sat them on Tammy's desk.

"So now..." Tammy continued, "You want me to try it."

"Well... honestly, I was all prepared to try it myself right out the gate, but for god knows what reason, it works less than half as well on men... and, more importantly, you kinda needed it more than I did. I've been bullied, but you've been massacred! I figured you would appreciate first dibs."

"That, and you need to make sure it doesn't give you super cancer?" She smirked. Justin nervously pulled his lips in before Tammy continued. "I'm just messing with ya. I actually do really appreciate this. So how does this work?"

"Blue is for light growth, Yellow is for moderate, Red is for extreme. Do whichever you're comfortable with."
15.title: Tammy, his tiny gamer friend

choices: "Something about saying you could kiss me?"
Uh-oh, Tammy's father came back early!
153.content:
"Alright..." Tammy said, picking up the yellow vial, "If this is a prank, I'm unfriending you from Christian Mingle." Justin snickered.

"Oh god!" Tammy downed the whole vial and immediately recoiled at the atrocious taste. "That tasted rank!"

"Well yeah, you just drank pure chemicals! What the heck were you expecting?" Justin snarkily replied.

"I dunno, I thought you would put in, like... lemon flavoring, or something!" She yelled back, leaning over her desk. She placed the vial down and re-adjusted her glasses. "Hang on... something happening..." She spread her feet out and stood straight up. "This feels... good..." Justin took a closer look at her, and noticed that her whole body appeared to be pulsing slightly. "Like something's... ugh... pumping me up..." As she said this, her breathing began to steadily escalate. Each pulse was becoming more pronounced, and it appeared as though her whole body was bulging outwards a little bit each time.

Justin kneeled down a little to get eye level with Tammy, and realized that the formula wasn't just pumping her muscles out, it was making her taller, too! Every few seconds it looked like she got a new burst of height, like another half an inch was added. "Something... urgh... stretching me out... oh!" And she was clearly enjoying it.

Tammy jolted past 5' 3", and said, "Justin... why... why didn't you tell me that this felt so fucking awesome?" She flexed both of her biceps, causing the sleeves on her t-shirt to tear just a little at the end. She gave a devious grin.

"Uh... rats cannot communicate their arousal to me..." Justin responded, in a tone that was equal parts concerned, snarky, and intruiged.

Tammy giggled. "Hehe, I like you Justin, you're funny... urgh... and you make stuff... oh... stuff that does cool things... mmm... like this!" She says, as she gives one last flex, and finishes off her growth spurt, landing at 5' 6". Observing the aftermath, Justin looked over every last inch of Tammy's new and improved body. Her new height had caused her skirt to rise up her legs, and her blue t-shirt to start showing a midriff, exposing part of her well well-defined six-pack. Looking over the rest of her body, it seemed easily comporable to that of a far-end fitness model,maybe even a lower-end female body builder. Her legs especially, which were previously small and twig-like, had grown especially thick with hard muscle, and had gotten proportionately longer compared to the rest of her body. Even her breasts increased a fair bit, going from a flat A-cup to a much more noticeable C-cup.

Tammy's brain left its state of delusional euphoria and she was able to take a deep breath. She then allowed herself to have a much more mentally stable freak-out moment.
"Ohmygod ohmygod ohmygod, this is so freaking amazing! I'm actually eye level with you! Do you have any idea how fucking fantastic this is?" She frantically spouted.

"Yeah... uh... I can tell you're pretty excited." Justin shyly remarked.

"Honest to god Justin, I feel like I could freaking kiss you right now!"

"What?"

She continued, "My entire life I've been the butt of jokes about how tiny I am, and you were actually able to give me this! This is seriously the coolest thing that has ever happened to me! I cannot possibly thank you enough!"
153.title: Tammy drank the yellow vial.

155.content:

Turning their head to look at the formulas saying "You had better not be taking anything illegal."

The coach hinted "Now if they are would you mind bringing them to the next sports meeting this Friday, after all the team need all the help they can get." With that the ________ coach left the room.
155.title: A coach appears.

1555.content:
Justin did as he was told and brought 5 vials of the yellow formula and 1 vial of the red formula. Justin had no idea why he decided to throw in the red vial before heading to the aquatic facility but it was to late to turn back now.

The swim team was small and had only 5 young women all 18 year old seniors. The girls swim team had not had a winning season in over 10 years and that fact had led to no new girls wanting to join. That was fine with Jessica, Amber, Julia, Melissa, and Kim as they were all good friends and being the only girls on the swim team was a hangout for them. They also all liked to swim and while they were good at it they lacked the discipline and killer instinct to be truly great. Swimming was fun. It is also did not help their desire to win that they were all rich kids and did not need an athletic scholarship unlike their coach Nicole Avery who set several college records and could have been in the Olympics if not for a car accident.

When Justin entered the pool facility all 5 swimmers had started doing the 100 meter breast stroke for a quick warm up. Nicole shouted " Focus on form for the first warm up drill not speed."

She then saw Justin and said "Well you finally made it. Did you bring your sports supplements?" Justin took off his backpack and grabbed the 5 yellow vials. "If each of those girls drink one of these they will win state." Coach Avery crossed her hands across her chest which was a B cup and said "Bull shit." Then after an awkward silence she blew her whistle and shouted "Out of the pool supplement time." Each young woman got out of the pool soaking wet their school one piece swimming suits clinging to their young bodies as they came over to Justin and Coach Avery. When they were all present Coach Avery spoke and said "We have a new sports drink from the chemistry department here at East Metropolis High School. If it works you girls should be a lot better. Now Justin hand them out." With that Justin handed out the vials and girls all looked at the yellow vials with a look of puzzlement and curiosity. The silence was shattered when Coach Avery said "Drink up ladies. We will win state this year." With that each of the 5 girls started laughing but one after the other downed the vials.

After around a minute Melissa who was the first to drink her vial said "Coach Avery I am feeling hot all over I need to jump back in the pool." As she turned to walk back towards the pool Justin, Coach Avery, and the other girls witnessed Melissa's swim suit start to tear. Coach Avery cursed out loud "Every year I ask for new swim suits and but no and now I have one tearing." As she rambled on Kim interrupted her and said "Coach Avery that is not it. Something crazy has happened look at Melissa." They all watched in awe as Melissa completely naked tore through the water at speeds that would smash male records. As the young female swimmers watched in all at their friend and teammate their own bodies began to erupt with strength and layer upon layer of muscles. No fabric short of Kevlar could of have withstood the extreme stretching the young ladies expanding bodies put on the suits and one after the other the seams broke and each young woman showed off her Amazon like physique to Justin and Coach Avery. Justin quickly sported a massive boner as the 4 women on front of him all looked like goddesses. Perfect skin, the perfect hour glass figure, breasts that defied gravity, and massive feminine muscles. He tried to hide his erection but Jessica saw it and laughed. It is all right Justin I know we are hot and naked. Besides I am wet right now in more ways then one just looking at Julia." Finally Coach Avery looked at Justin whose boner was causing him sheer discomfort and said my office Justin. As for the rest of you young ladies get in the pool. Put those new muscles to work."

Coach Avery followed Justin into her office and closed the door. She looked at Justin straight in the eyes and said "Please tell me you have another one of those vials" as she took off her blouse. Justin came on his pants and stuttered "Kind of" as he pulled out the red vial.
1555.title: Female Swimming

info.brief_description: High School nerd Justin has made a muscle growth formula, watch as the chaos unfolds.
info.description:
WILL ADD 300 POINTS FOR GOOD CHAPTERS

Justin was a nerd. But he was also a genius. Tired of being pushed around by both the girls and the boys at East Metropolis High, he developed a muscle and strength enhancer. Placing the enhancer in different sports drinks of various strengths and mixtures, Justin was about to try the formula out on himself, or perhaps others in his school. Only there were a couple of major problems he did not foresee.

The colours for the experimental drinks are:

Blue was moderate muscle gain and strength increase.
Yellow was large muscle gain and large strength increase
Red was very large muscle gain and strength increase.

1st October 2019 2750 Views let's keep it up.
info.pretty_title: High School of Female Muscle Growth
